about_the_game:
Navigate the Archipelago of Logic



「Archipel Logic Infinite」 is an enthralling puzzle game inspired by Nurikabe.

Uncover ancient archipelagos exposed by drastic drops in sea levels due to tectonic shifts and climate change. Draw the boundaries between land and sea to complete your maps and solve.

Key Features


  • Captivating Story-Driven Puzzles (The demo includes only 10 puzzles)
    Embark on a journey through a main story mode featuring unique themes and engaging narratives that pull you into the world of ancient explorers.
  • Endlessly AI-Generated Puzzles (Not included in the demo)
    Keep your mind sharp with puzzles that are infinitely generated by AI, perfectly tuned to match your skill level and keep you constantly challenged.
  • Innovative Puzzle Mechanics
    Experience a fresh gameplay dynamic as you reveal land and sea to solve each puzzle, offering a distinctive and rewarding puzzle-solving experience.
  • Minimalist Graphics and Stunning BGM
    Enjoy the game’s simple yet elegant graphics paired with a fantastic background music that enhances the immersive atmosphere and keeps you engaged.

Summon your courage and become a legendary explorer! Follow the whispering waves, trace the paths of ancient navigators, discover new archipelagos, and unveil the secrets of mythical islands. Be the first to chart the legendary archipelago and claim your place in history!

short_description: 「Archipel Logic Infinite」 is a challenging puzzle game inspired by the popular Nurikabe. Explore legendary archipelagos by marking cells as land or sea to unchart maps. Enjoy challenging puzzles and endless procedurally generated content for limitless exploration.
